description: Open culture communities are passionate, dedicated backed by people. What happens when those people need to change their roles within the community? I've played varied roles in open culture communities through the years. In this talk I'll go over what worked well and what I wish I had approached in a different way when my role needed to change.

videos.title: The Graceful Exit: Approaches for Changing One's Role in an Open Community

title: The Graceful Exit: Approaches for Changing One's Role in an Open Community
